remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow3 , first part.  The stabilizer of a given Sylow subgroup ` K ` in the group action ` .(+) ` acting on all of ` G ` is the normalizer N_G(K).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow3.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
sylow3.xf $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow3.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
sylow3lem1.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow3lem1.d $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
sylow3lem1.m $e |- .(+) = ( x e. X , y e. ( P pSyl G ) |-> ran ( z e. y |-> ( ( x .+ z ) .- x ) ) ) $.
sylow3lem2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( P pSyl G ) ) $.
sylow3lem2.h $e |- H = { u e. X | ( u .(+) K ) = K } $.
sylow3lem2.n $e |- N = { x e. X | A. y e. X ( ( x .+ y ) e. K <-> ( y .+ x ) e. K ) } $.
sylow3lem2 $p |- ( ph -> H = N ) $.
$d .(+) u x y z $.

$d G u x y z $.
$d H x y $.
